Name: Veccol
About the game: Veccol is an arcade puzzle game where blocks of different color and size falls from the top. Match three or more of the blocks in any direction to clear them. When cleared, any block above the line will fall down, allowing for new matches. Set up these cascading line-clears to earn extra points. After certain amounts of line-clears, you will advance in level, causing the falling speed to increase. At certain levels, the difficulty will also change, adding more potential colors to the mix.
